channel.title: R on Danielle Chen
channel.description: Recent content in R on Danielle Chen

item.title: Survival Analysis of Randomized Placebo-controlled Trial of HIV-1 disease
item.description: 1.TL;DR In this analysis, survival Cox-ph model shows that portential risk factors for HIV-1 includes whether or not patients receive previous treatments (tx), patients’ ability to tolerate chemotherapy (karnof) and patient’s baseline cd4 counts (cd4). Exploratory analysis on mean, median survival time for HIV patients and non patients were compared before performing the model. This is the analysis I did when I took Survival Analysis course (BST 222) at UC Davis.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
